mediaDisplay.text:
You can play a slideshow of all pictures available on your media player; that is, all pictures on all external devices connected to your media player.
1. Press "Menu" on the remote to display the main menu. 2. Use the arrow keys on the remote to highlight "Pictures: in the menu and press "OK" on the remote to display the Pictures screen. 3. Select a picture and press the Play button on the remote to start a slideshow.
You can play a slideshow of all the pictures in a specific folder on a device connected to your media player.
1. Press "Menu" on the remote to display the main menu. 2. Use the arrow keys on the remote to highlight "Pictures" in the menu and press "OK" on the remote to display the Pictures screen. 3. Press "Menu" again to display the Pictures menu, select "Browse Folders", and click "OK". 4. Browse through the picture folders stored on the devices connected to the media player. 5. When you’ve selected a folder of pictures to play, press the Play button on the remote to start the slideshow.
